did.unittitle: University of Connecticut, Graduate Student Calendar Records

repository.corpname: Archives & Special Collections at the Thomas J. Dodd Research Center, University of Connecticut Libraries

did.abstract: University of Connecticut Graduate Student Calendar from 1977.

bioghist.head: History
bioghist.p: The Graduate School at the University of Connecticut is responsible for facilitating graduate education and research. It serves as the primary advocate for the University's research mission by creating opportunities for research and fostering the scholarly basis for new and continuing research efforts. The graduate student calendar lists the events and important dates of the academic school year for the University of Connecticut'sGraduate School.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: Archives & Special Collections has a substantial collection of materials pertaining to the University, its history, administration, faculty, staff and students. For detailed information on these collections please contact the curator or ask at the Reading Room desk.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: The graduate student calendar lists the events and important dates of the academic school year for the University of Connecticut's Graduate School. The records contain the graduate student calendar for the academic year 1977.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: The collection is open and available for research.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use and Copyright Information
userestrict.p: Permission to publish from these Papers must be obtained in writing from both the University of Connecticut Libraries and the owner(s) of the copyright.

acqinfo.head: Provenance and Acquisition
acqinfo.p: The records were donated to the Thomas J. Dodd Research Center.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Item description, #:#], University of Connecticut, Graduate Student Calender Records. Archives & Special Collections at the Thomas J. Dodd Research Center, University of Connecticut Libraries.
